titleStmt.title: A collection of the several writings and faithful testimonies of that suffering servant of God, and patient follower of the Lamb, Humphry Smith who dyed a prisoner for the testimony of Jesus, in Winchester common-goal the 4th day of the 3d moneth in the year 1663.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

titleStmt.title: A collection of the several writings and faithful testimonies of that suffering servant of God, and patient follower of the Lamb, Humphry Smith who dyed a prisoner for the testimony of Jesus, in Winchester common-goal the 4th day of the 3d moneth in the year 1663.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: Pages 7-8 are torn in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-15 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library, New York copy and inserted at the end.
